name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in a plank position, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor, then push back up.
techniqueTips: Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels
Lower yourself until your chest nearly touches the ground
Push through your palms, not your fingertips
Engage your core throughout the movement

name: Pull-ups
instructions: Hang from a bar with arms extended, pull your body up until your chin is over the bar.
techniqueTips: Start with a dead hang, arms fully extended
Pull your shoulder blades down and back
Focus on pulling your chest to the bar
Control the descent - don't just drop down

name: Bench Press
instructions: Lie on bench, lower barbell to chest, press up until arms are fully extended.
techniqueTips: Plant your feet firmly on the ground
Maintain a slight arch in your lower back
Lower the bar to your chest with control
Press up in a straight line over your chest

name: Squats
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, lower body by bending knees, return to standing.
techniqueTips: Keep your chest up and core engaged
Descend until your thighs are parallel to the floor
Drive through your heels to stand up
Keep your knees aligned with your toes

name: Burpees
instructions: Start standing, drop to squat, jump back to plank, do push-up, jump feet to squat, jump up with arms overhead.
techniqueTips: Maintain good form even when fatigued
Land softly when jumping back to plank
Keep your core tight during the push-up
Explode up with arms overhead for maximum benefit
